Text: DO NOT DOWNLOAD DOES NOT WORK I CONVERTED THIS GAY WBFS FILE TO ISO AS WBFS MANAGER 2.5 WOULD NOT ACCEPT IT EVERYTHING WORKED FINE UNTILL I START THE GAME AND GET THE DREDED BLACK SCREEN OF DEATH CHANGED IOS MESSED AROUND NO UCK DONT DOWNLOAD THIS GUY SHOULD UPLOAD ISO FILES NOT GAY CURRUPT WBFS FILES

How could i be so stuped all i had to do was Force NTSC in usb loader and it works so id like to apoligise for my last comment it was 5 in the morning and in was fraustrated game works fine no problems

@crispykiller96

It's alright.. glad you got it working :D

I have my Wii hooked up to a standard TV (SDTV - 480i) so I need to not only force NTSC but 480i because for some reason, most games like to default to 480p, which will display on the TV, but will be distorted and colorless.

@KnuxTheFox

Are you using composite cables? These are only capable of displaying 480i. Also, go to Wii Settings > TV Resolutions > Standard TV (480i) rather than EDTV/HDTV (480P).

i have usbloadergx and its been updated as of today and i have cios revision 21 (it was a successful update because black ops works now)[plus i had revision 17 when i first installed cios 249 and all the games worked fine, i upgrade to a newer cios until 21 and it still didnt work] when i loaded it on usbloadergx it gave me a black screen and the the remote lost connection. i forced NTSC but it still does not work at all. i think it could be some of the things i have on priiloader or something but i am not too sure. do you think there is a reason for this?
